Module ru.nsu.plodushcheva
Package ru.nsu.plodushcheva.model.snakes

Class BaseEnemySnake

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.plodushcheva.model.snakes.BaseEnemySnake
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnemySnakeFood, EnemySnakeRandom
public abstract class BaseEnemySnake extends Object
Base class for enemy snakes in the game. For enemy snake food and enemy snake random.
